casebody.data:
George BURNS, Mack McCann, and Charles Bartlett, Trustees of Park's Chapel Free Will Baptist Church, Plaintiffs,
v.
KINGDOM IMPACT GLOBAL MINISTRIES, INC., Defendant. No. COA17-928 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 21, 2018

MODIFIED. AFFIRMED IN PART. VACATED. REMANDED IN PART.
